comments: The oblong numbers (A002378) not divisible by 3. - _Gionata Neri_, May 10 2015
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
formula: Sum(k>=0, 1/a(k)) = Pi/3/sqrt(3). - _Benoit Cloitre_, Aug 20 2002a(n) = 18*n+a(n-1) with a(0) = 2. [_Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 12 2010]
